title: 35.5 P land for sale in Piliyandala
details:
35.5 Perches solid land available for sale in Piliyandala. 100m to the bypass road.
Water board mains, Electricity and Bimsaviya deeds.

Ideal for a Residential Apartment Project. Going cheap for 7.5 Laks per perch OR to the highest offer before 8th June.

Owner leaving Island.
